channel.title: Everybody can log in with any pass in any acc bug
channel.description:
I have a source and client for experiments Now this bug is really annoying I made a test account called: Test and pass: 123 then log in and then i get this: [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/1zeleud.png[/img] (READ THE PICTURE) Then i logged out and then i just simply put a 4 behind my password like this: 1234 And then it still logs in on the same account but then with a different password. Idk how to fix this because im a noob and i never saw this before.
Help is really much appreciated.

item.title: Everybody can log in with any pass in any acc bug
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

It is not saving the character file. You probably touched something there you werenâ€™t supposed to. Just rip the playerSave from the source you originally downloaded.

Read full topic
item.source: Everybody can log in with any pass in any acc bug
